lang.langstring: Toggles the use of shadows and highlights for pages while turning. Slight impact on performance.
Toggles the use of the page reflection below the actual book. Heavy impact on performance.
Toggles the use of liquid scaling, i.e. whether to adjust the book size to the window size on resize.

Toggles whether to automatically move the book on mouse move, if it is larger than the area used to display it. When disabled, you can drag the book around by keeping the left mouse button pressed and moving the mouse.
